attributes.action: End the lobbyists in politics, especially the lobbyists that favor Israel!
attributes.additional_details:
Everyone in the public is aware of the corruption that runs in our politics that mainly stems from the money by outside influences that do not care about our nation. YOU are meant to represent OUR interests! Not THEIRS! I'ts all clear to see with the wars destabilizing the Middle east, ISIS not attacking Israel, I'ts nukes not being investigated, the genocide in Palestine.
http://www.powerbase.info/index.php/Conservative_Friends_of_Israel
http://www.powerbase.info/index.php/Zionist_Federation
attributes.background: Syria, Iraq, Libya, Afghanistan have all been shams which have resulted in millions of lives lost! The lobbyists have affected our country by plaguing YOU the politicians, especially those that favor Israel as the only winners of these murderous wars have been them and the Blairs that pocket from it

rejection.details: We are not sure what specific action you want the UK Government or Parliament to take about this issue. If you would like a specific change to the way in which all professional lobbyists are regulated, you could start a petition calling for that change.
